shortDescription: Beautiful 3-bedroom family home with spacious garden
longDescription: This stunning 3-bedroom detached house offers exceptional family living in the heart of Bromley. The property features a modern kitchen, bright living spaces, and a beautiful landscaped garden perfect for entertaining. Close to excellent schools and transport links.

Contemporary 2-bedroom flat in the vibrant Camden area. Features open-plan living, modern fixtures, and excellent transport connections. Perfect for professionals or couples. Walking distance to Camden Market and excellent nightlife.

shortDescription: Luxury 5-bedroom Victorian house with period features
longDescription: Magnificent Victorian family home offering spacious accommodation over three floors. This property retains many original features including high ceilings, ornate cornicing, and fireplaces. Large garden, off-street parking, and close to Putney Bridge station.

shortDescription: Cozy 1-bedroom flat ideal for first-time buyers
longDescription: Perfect starter home or investment property. This well-maintained 1-bedroom flat features a modern kitchen, good-sized bedroom, and is located in a popular residential area. Great transport links to the City and Canary Wharf.

Impressive 4-bedroom semi-detached property offering versatile family accommodation. Features include a large kitchen/dining room, separate living room, master bedroom with en-suite, garage, and driveway. Well-regarded local schools nearby.

Exceptional penthouse apartment with private terrace offering panoramic views. High-spec finish throughout, three double bedrooms, luxury bathroom and en-suite. Concierge service, gym, and moments from Paddington station.

Delightful 2-bedroom terraced house full of character. Features exposed beams, wood floors, and a courtyard garden. Recently refurbished kitchen and bathroom. Easy access to Crossrail and excellent local amenities.
